titleStmt.title: The agrement of the holye fathers, and doctors of the churche, vpon the cheifest articles of Christian religion as appeareth on the nexte syde folowinge, very necessary for all curates. Gathered together by Iohn Aungell preist, one of the Quenes maiesties chapleyns.
titleStmt.author: Angel, John, fl. 1555.

titleStmt.title: The agrement of the holye fathers, and doctors of the churche, vpon the cheifest articles of Christian religion as appeareth on the nexte syde folowinge, very necessary for all curates. Gathered together by Iohn Aungell preist, one of the Quenes maiesties chapleyns.
titleStmt.author: Angel, John, fl. 1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By William Harford, for William Seres. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 958 on UMI microfilm reel 307.
Reproductions of the originals in Bodleian Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 165 Â£ (Bodleian Library copy) and at reel 307 #1 (British Library copy, identified as STC 958).
